name: CardiacSurgeriesOtherThanCABGSNOMEDCT
title: Cardiac Surgeries Other Than CABG SNOMED CT
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values identifies patients who have a cardiac surgery procedure other than a CABG.  These procedures include surgery on heart valves or congenital heart defects.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have a cardiac surgery procedure other than a CABG.  Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Procedure category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only use codes which represent a cardiac surgery procedure other than a CABG.  Codes used are to be SNOMED-CT codes only.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes that represent a cardiac procedure performed using a scope.)
